level.heading: Additional standards for providers of severe weather shelter.
level.text: In addition to the standards in ยง 4-754.21, providers of severe weather shelter shall provide:
When severe weather conditions continue overnight, a clean bed with clean linens, pad, and blanket for each bed;
Basic needs, such as food and clothing and other supportive services, or information about where to obtain such basic needs and supportive services;
Cool water, available via water cooler, fountain, or other means; and
Properly functioning heating and cooling systems during the appropriate seasons.
